programme.desc: When their plane crash-lands in the African bush, two bickering siblings find themselves force to rely on their wits - and their courageous dog - to help them conquer their fears and survive. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.(n)

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.

programme.title: Freezer
programme.desc: Wisecracking ex-con Robert is kidnapped and held hostage in a walk-in freezer by Russian thugs, who are convinced he has $8million from them. As he struggles to fight back against the cold, he soon discovers he is not alone. Thriller, starring Dylan McDermott.

programme.title: Dark Places
programme.desc: A seven-year-old girl witnesses the murder of her mother and sisters, and testifies that her teenage brother was the killer, leading to his imprisonment. As an adult, she attends a gathering of true-crime fans, and discovers they all think her brother was innocent. She reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime, and begins to realise her memories may not be as reliable as she thought. Mystery, starring Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult, Christina Hendricks and Chloe Grace Moretz.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Detectives Riggs and Murtaugh team up with a reformed small-time crook and a tough, female internal-affairs investigator to track down a former policeman trafficking impounded weaponry to the bosses of organised crime. Action thriller sequel, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci and Rene Russo.

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro.

programme.title: Exposed
programme.desc: A detective is determined to bring his dead partner's killers to justice, despite warnings from both his superior officers and the murdered man's wife to forget about it. As he delves deeper, he uncovers dangerous secrets and evidence of political corruption, with a devoutly religious woman seemingly the key to the mystery. Crime thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Ana de Armas and Mira Sorvino.

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Small-time crook Tony Montana emigrates from Cuba to the US, determined to become rich and powerful. Admitted into the inner circle of a Miami drug lord, he ultimately takes over his boss's empire and even his wife. However, his paranoia and cocaine addiction begin to spiral out of control, while his enemies circle, waiting for the chance to bring him down. Gangster thriller remake, with Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer and Robert Loggia.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to live with his father in Tokyo after a brush with the law, but soon becomes involved in illegal street racing. When he ends up owing money to gangsters after losing a race against a driver with Yakuza connections, he has to learn to master the Japanese style of driving to win and pay back his debts. Action adventure, starring Lucas Black, Nathalie Kelley and Bow Wow.

programme.title: Go With Me
programme.desc: A woman returns to the isolated logging community where she grew up, and is stalked by a former cop, who now heads up a criminal organisation in the area that operates above the law. She resolves to take a stand against him, seeking the aid of a retired logger and his sidekick. Thriller based on Castle Freeman Jr's novel, starring Julia Stiles, Anthony Hopkins, Alexander Ludwig and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: Bound to Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman who is kidnapped fights back and manages to escape from her captor. She later learns she was not his only victim, and that there was a dark secret behind her abduction. The discovery drives her to hatch a plan to punish him for the suffering he has caused. Thriller, starring Tina Ivlev.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Kidnapping Freddy Heineken
programme.desc: Five men struggling to make ends meet decide to kidnap a beer tycoon who is one of Europe's richest men. The plan is a success, and they demand the biggest ransom in history - but tensions within the group threaten their chances of escaping the law. Fact-based crime drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Jim Sturgess and Sam Worthington.

programme.title: Swelter
programme.desc: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past. Drama, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina and Lennie James.

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A political lobbyist recovering from a painful break-up forms a passionate new relationship with a charming stranger. However, she begins to wonder whether she can trust her new boyfriend has his behaviour grows increasingly volatile - a situation that only gets worse when her ex resurfaces. Thriller, starring Sanaa Lathan and Michael Ealy.

programme.title: The Loft
programme.desc: Five successful married men rent an apartment where they can carry out their extra-marital affairs in secret. The arrangement works well until they find the corpse of a beautiful woman handcuffed to a bed - but which of them is the killer, and how will the grisly discovery affect their friendship? Thriller, with Karl Urban, James Marsden and Wentworth Miller.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Victorian stage illusionists Robert Angier and Alfred Borden engage in a bitter personal and professional rivalry. The pair resort to increasingly brutal measures to sabotage each other's acts, while Angier becomes obsessed with the secret behind Borden's greatest illusion. Christopher Nolan's mystery thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo and Scarlett Johansson, with David Bowie as real-life scientific pioneer Nikola Tesla.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A former gangster is released from jail and vows to go straight, hoping to earn enough money to escape his New York roots - but his misguided loyalty to a crooked lawyer threatens to drag him back into a life of crime. Brian De Palma's thriller, starring Al Pacino, Sean Penn, Penelope Ann Miller, John Leguizamo and Viggo Mortensen.

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier II
programme.desc: Haunted by the loss of his best friends in the Essex Range Rover murders, gangster Carlton Leach considers leaving his violent lifestyle behind him. Crime thriller, starring Ricci Harnett, Luke Mably and Steven Berkoff.

programme.title: We Still Kill the Old Way
programme.desc: A former gangster returns to London after 30 years living in exile in Spain when he receives word of his brother's murder. Angered by the brutality of a new generation of criminals who have taken over his territory, he gets his old partners in crime back together to avenge his sibling and restore order to the streets. Gangster drama, starring Ian Ogilvy and Allison Doody.(n)

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: A teenager in the 1980s idolises a band of football hooligans and is soon drawn into their ranks. As their confrontations with rival teams' supporters grow increasingly violent, he begins to realise he has made a mistake getting involved - but finds leaving the firm is not easy. Remake of Alan Clarke's 1989 drama, starring Calum MacNab and Paul Anderson.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: Hannah, the niece of Southern drugs kingpin Frank Stinson, longs to escape the spiral of violence that dominates her existence. When her impressionable sister Amber falls in love with Wild Bill, one of Uncle Frank's bitter rivals, Hannah spots a way to finally put an end to her misery by using her guile to pit the two men against each other in a vengeful game. Crime thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Sean Bean and Alexa Vega.(n)

programme.title: The Captive
programme.desc: A couple are plagued by the disappearance of their young daughter, eight years after she went missing, and a series of disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she is still alive. Thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds, Kevin Durand, Mireille Enos and Rosario Dawson.(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: A gangster in 1970s Boston agrees to collaborate with an FBI agent in the hope of eliminating their common enemy - the Italian Mafia. However, the arrangement soon spirals out of control as the mobster uses his insider knowledge to outwit the law and consolidate his own power. Fact-based gangster drama, starring Johnny Depp, Benedict Cumberbatch, Joel Edgerton, Dakota Johnson and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow.(n)

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agent's nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersen's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott.(n)

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: A federal marshal sets out in pursuit of an escaped prisoner who is determined to prove his murder conviction was false. As the chase progresses, the marshal is forced to work with a diplomatic security agent, making him realise the fugitive is no ordinary convict and that his claims of innocence may be true. Thriller sequel, starring Tommy Lee Jones reprising his Oscar-winning role from The Fugitive, alongside Wesley Snipes and Robert Downey Jr.(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: A gangster in 1970s Boston agrees to collaborate with an FBI agent in the hope of eliminating their common enemy - the Italian Mafia. However, the arrangement soon spirals out of control as the mobster uses his insider knowledge to outwit the law and consolidate his own power. Fact-based gangster drama, starring Johnny Depp, Benedict Cumberbatch, Joel Edgerton, Dakota Johnson and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama about an FBI agent who goes undercover in the Mafia and becomes the protege of a gangster. However, the demands of his new double-life place an intolerable strain on his relationship with his family, especially as he faces the ultimate prospect of betraying his mentor. Starring Johnny Depp, Al Pacino, Michael Madsen, Anne Heche and Bruno Kirby.(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow.(n)

programme.title: All Hallows' Eve
programme.desc: A teenager looking after two children at Halloween discovers an old video tape in their trick or treat bag. She plays it and discovers it contains recordings of horrific incidents involving a sinister clown - but does not realise that by watching the films she is summoning him into being. Horror anthology, starring Katie Maguire and Mike Giannelli.

programme.title: Dark Signal
programme.desc: A murdered girl's spirit returns with a message for the staff of a radio station. Horror, starring Siwan Morris, Gareth David-Lloyd, Joanna Ignaczewska and Duncan Pow.

programme.title: The Taking of Deborah Logan
programme.desc: Deborah, an elderly woman with an aggressive form of Alzheimer's disease, reluctantly agrees to allow a team of film-makers to document her condition. However, when Deborah begins to exhibit behaviours unusual even for someone with her illness, the crew begins to suspect something much more sinister is happening to their subject. Found-footage horror thriller, starring Jill Larson.

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new animated adventure, starring plastic caped crusader who almost stole the show in The Lego Movie.

programme.title: The Quiet Hour
programme.desc: In a not-too-distant future, a ruthless alien invasion reduces Earth's few remaining humans to scavengers, ready to prey on their own kind as a means to survive. In a remote corner of the British countryside, feisty teenager Sarah makes a desperate attempt to protect her blind younger sister and defend her family's farm from a group of vicious bandits, all while avoiding an untimely demise at the hands of the from the extra-terrestrial threat. Sci-fi thriller, starring Dakota Blue Richards.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Billionaire Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice, consumed with rage over his parents' murder. Trained by a secret society, he hones his fighting skills and returns to his home city of Gotham on a mission to rid it of crime and corruption in the guise of a masked vigilante. Comic-book adventure, exploring the origins of the Dark Knight, with Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Cillian Murphy, Gary Oldman and Katie Holmes.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: The Quiet Hour
programme.desc: In a not-too-distant future, a ruthless alien invasion reduces Earth's few remaining humans to scavengers, ready to prey on their own kind as a means to survive. In a remote corner of the British countryside, feisty teenager Sarah makes a desperate attempt to protect her blind younger sister and defend her family's farm from a group of vicious bandits, all while avoiding an untimely demise at the hands of the from the extra-terrestrial threat. Sci-fi thriller, starring Dakota Blue Richards.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Billionaire Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice, consumed with rage over his parents' murder. Trained by a secret society, he hones his fighting skills and returns to his home city of Gotham on a mission to rid it of crime and corruption in the guise of a masked vigilante. Comic-book adventure, exploring the origins of the Dark Knight, with Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Cillian Murphy, Gary Oldman and Katie Holmes.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: Five college students spend their spring break at an isolated cabin, but the holiday takes a horrific turn after a mysterious stranger infects them with a deadly flesh-eating virus. As they struggle to save their disintegrating bodies, they also come under attack from locals who do not care for strangers. Horror remake, starring Gage Golightly and Matthew Daddario.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Detectives hunt a killer who kidnaps his victims and forces them to play sadistic games with life-or-death consequences. Meanwhile, two strangers wake to find themselves chained to pipes in a filthy, derelict bathroom - and at the mercy of the madman, who sets them a twisted challenge. Horror, written by and starring Leigh Whannell, alongside Cary Elwes, Danny Glover and Dina Meyer.

programme.title: Pod
programme.desc: Two siblings visit their brother's isolated cabin and find him rambling about mysterious government conspiracies. They wonder if it is a symptom of his PTSD or whether he may be right. Horror, starring Lauren Ashley Carter, Dean Cates and Brian Morvant.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: A dull American town in the middle of the desert is suddenly attacked by huge man-eating subterranean creatures. Luckily, two dimwitted but brave handymen step into the breach to lead a ragtag bunch of locals and a mismatched pair of survivalists in the battle against the gruesome worm-like monsters. Comedy horror, with Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross, Reba McEntire and Bobby Jacoby.

programme.title: The Great Wall: Special
programme.desc: A look at the epic action adventure starring Matt Damon, Pedro Pascal and Willem Dafoe.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde.

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: A dull American town in the middle of the desert is suddenly attacked by huge man-eating subterranean creatures. Luckily, two dimwitted but brave handymen step into the breach to lead a ragtag bunch of locals and a mismatched pair of survivalists in the battle against the gruesome worm-like monsters. Comedy horror, with Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross, Reba McEntire and Bobby Jacoby.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.

programme.title: Chastity Bites
programme.desc: A 500-year-old murderer maintains her eternal youth by bathing in the blood of virgins, and sustains her supplies by leading a double life as a conservative campaigner for sexual abstinence. A teenage blogger discovers her secret, and tries to prevent her friend from becoming the latest victim. Comedy horror, starring Allison Scagliotti and Louise Griffiths.(n)

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoeven's sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens.(n)

programme.title: Alien Resurrection
programme.desc: Scientists create a clone of Ripley to get hold of the alien queen growing inside her body and breed a new race of the monsters. However, when the creatures escape and turn on their makers, the new Ripley must lead a smuggling crew caught up in the mayhem to safety. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As hobbits Frodo and Sam near the end of their journey into the dark lands of Mordor to destroy the One Ring, the evil Sauron unleashes the full might of his armies on Middle-earth. Meanwhile, Aragorn must fulfil his destiny of becoming king by leading his people into a climactic battle with the forces of darkness. Conclusion of the fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen and Sean Astin.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As hobbits Frodo and Sam near the end of their journey into the dark lands of Mordor to destroy the One Ring, the evil Sauron unleashes the full might of his armies on Middle-earth. Meanwhile, Aragorn must fulfil his destiny of becoming king by leading his people into a climactic battle with the forces of darkness. Conclusion of the fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen and Sean Astin.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: Full Metal Jacket
programme.desc: Raw recruits undergo harsh training under a domineering Marine drill sergeant after being called up for service in the Vietnam War, but his brutal methods lead to the breakdown of one of his cadets. Eventually, some of the fully trained soldiers get their first taste of combat in 1968. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Matthew Modine, Adam Baldwin, Vincent D'Onofrio and R Lee Ermey.

programme.title: A Clockwork Orange
programme.desc: Sadistic young gang leader Alex leads a carefree life indulging his love of rape, violence and classical music. When he is finally arrested, he is subjected to a sinister form of aversion therapy that brainwashes him into being physically unable to use violence. However, on his release, he finds friends and family have turned on him, while others seek to exploit him to further their political ends. Drama, starring Malcolm McDowell and Warren Clarke.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: A philandering aristocrat in 18th-century France schemes with his manipulative former lover to seduce a virtuous young woman. As their conspiracy becomes ever more tangled, events take an unexpected turn. Stephen Frears' Oscar-winning drama of sexual politics, based on Pierre Choderlos de Laclos' novel, starring John Malkovich, Glenn Close, Michelle Pfeiffer, Swoosie Kurtz, Uma Thurman and Keanu Reeves.

programme.title: Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed
programme.desc: An English teacher in Spain picks up two hitchhikers on his quest to meet John Lennon. Comedy drama set in 1966, starring Javier Camara, Natalia de Molina and Francesc Colomer.

programme.title: The Wonders
programme.desc: The lives of a family of bee keepers living in isolation in central Italy are disturbed by the arrival of a troubled teenage boy, who has been taken on as a farmhand, and a television production crew. Against her father's wishes, Gelsomina enters the family onto a reality TV show about traditional Italian food. Drama, starring Alba Rohrwacher. In Italian.

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: The captain of an American destroyer in the South Atlantic is still recovering from the sinking of his previous vessel. He tries to outwit a cunning German U-boat commander, but comes to respect the courage of his enemy. However, his crew fears he is not up to the challenge of defeating his opponent. Second World War thriller, starring Robert Mitchum, Curt Jurgens, Theodore Bikel and David Hedison.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original.

programme.title: Selma
programme.desc: In 1965, amidst an atmosphere of racial unrest, civil rights campaigner Dr Martin Luther King Jr plans a peaceful march across Alabama from Selma to Montgomery. His goal is to persuade President Lyndon B Johnson to change the law, allowing black people to register to vote. Fact-based drama, starring David Oyelowo, Tom Wilkinson and Carmen Ejogo.

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Five criminals are brought together by a police line-up, and decide to join forces to pull off one more big job. However, they discover their meeting was not a coincidence and that a mysterious crime lord has plans for them. Bryan Singer's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Kevin Spacey, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak, Stephen Baldwin, Pete Postlethwaite, Chazz Palminteri and Suzy Amis.

programme.title: Gentlemen
programme.desc: A terrified young writer hides in a Stockholm apartment, where he writes the story of its missing inhabitants, the flamboyant, charismatic Morgan brothers. Swedish thriller, starrring David Dencik, Sverrir Gudnason and David Fukamachi Regnfors.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai.

programme.title: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: A man finds himself living on the streets as his health deteriorates, leaving him with nowhere to turn. He tries to find a place in a shelter where he befriends another homeless man, who supports and advises him in an attempt to put his life back in order and reconcile with his estranged daughter. Drama, starring Richard Gere, Ben Vereen, Jena Malone and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: A hard-working family man discovers that his six-year-old son was accidentally mixed up with another baby at birth. As he considers how to resolve the situation, the devotion of his wife and the other family involved to the children they have raised makes him wonder if he has been a good father. Drama, starring Masaharu Fukuyama and Machiko Ono. In Japanese.

programme.title: Still the Water
programme.desc: Two teenagers fall in love while he is coming to terms with the divorce of his parents and she is coping with the imminent death of her mother. Coming-of-age drama, starring Nijiro Murakami, Jun Yoshinaga and Miyuki Matsuda.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.

programme.title: Couple in a Hole
programme.desc: A couple choose to live in a cave in the woods, surviving by hunting rabbits and feeding on insects. When the wife is bitten by a poisonous spider, they are forced to reconnect with the outside world and turn to a farmer for help, who takes a suspicious interest in their reasons for renouncing civilisation. Drama, starring Paul Higgins and Kate Dickie.

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: An American writer and his wife arrive in a picturesque French seaside town in France, their marriage in the middle of a crisis. They form friendships with locals and fellow visitors, while trying to repair the cracks in their relationship. Drama, directed by and starring Angelina Jolie, with Brad Pitt and Melanie Laurent.

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: A TV actor shuffles through life emotionally numbed by the drugs prescribed for him by his stern psychiatrist father. However, he decides to ditch the pills when returning home for his mother's funeral. Free of medication, his apathy begins to lift, and an eccentric local woman reawakens his joy for life. Romantic drama, written, directed by and starring Zach Braff, with Natalie Portman and Ian Holm.

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: A suburban family man has a mid-life crisis when he becomes infatuated with a friend of his teenage daughter. Struggling to cope with the unhealthy attention her father is lavishing on her friend, the girl begins a tentative relationship of her own, while her harassed mother is also having an affair. Sam Mendes' Oscar-winning black comedy drama, starring Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Mena Suvari and Wes Bentley.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 2
programme.desc: Hitwoman the Bride continues her relentless quest to exact revenge on the group responsible for trying to kill her. Two more of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad stand in her way before she can face-off against her mysterious mentor Bill. However, she has yet to realise that he has one last surprise waiting for her. Thriller sequel, starring Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah and Michael Madsen.(n)

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo.(n)

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: A hard-working family man discovers that his six-year-old son was accidentally mixed up with another baby at birth. As he considers how to resolve the situation, the devotion of his wife and the other family involved to the children they have raised makes him wonder if he has been a good father. Drama, starring Masaharu Fukuyama and Machiko Ono. In Japanese.(n)

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic.(n)

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara.(n)

programme.title: Journey to the Shore
programme.desc: A wife's husband returns to her three years after he drowned at sea, and she agrees to let him take her on a journey. Drama, starring Eri Fukatsu and Tadanobu Asano.(n)

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A journalist is driven to the brink of suicide by a smear campaign after he attempts to expose the CIA's alleged involvement with Contra rebels in Nicaragua and the importing of cocaine into California. Fact-based drama set during the 1990s, starring Jeremy Renner, Rosemarie DeWitt and Ray Liotta.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson.(n)

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A talented thief uses hi-tech devices to enter other people's dreams so he can steal their secrets. An industrialist hires him to perform a far more challenging job - to implant an idea into a corporate heir's mind, so he will think it is his own. However, the mission is compromised by the thief's own troubled psyche. Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tom Hardy.(n)

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Gerda Wegener unveils a portrait of her husband Einar dressed as a woman in 1920s Copenhagen. Einar realises that the woman in the painting is his true identity, and decides to become one of the first people to undergo sex reassignment surgery. Period drama based on David Ebershoff's novel inspired by the true story of artist Lili Elbe, starring Eddie Redmayne and an Oscar-winning Alicia Vikander.(n)

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: Biopic of the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson, following the singer-songwriter at two periods in his life. In the 1960s, he is at his creative peak, but haunted by inner demons that take their toll on his mental health. By the 1980s, he is a broken man dominated by a shady doctor, until a new relationship offers him a chance at recovery. Starring John Cusack, Paul Dano, Paul Giamatti and Elizabeth Banks.(n)

programme.title: Prevenge Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Alice Lowe talks about making her low-budget black comedy in which she stars as a mother-to-be who takes murderous orders from her unborn child.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: A precocious 16-year-old growing up in a 1950s seaside town seeks attention through provocative behaviour, leading her bewildered family to send her to a psychologist. As she becomes increasingly sexually active, her relationship with an older man has unexpected repercussions. Comedy drama, based on the early life of brothel madam Cynthia Payne, starring Emily Lloyd, Tom Bell and Jesse Birdsall.

programme.title: Midnight Lace
programme.desc: Doris Day starring in a tense psychological thriller is about as believable as Shirley Temple in a horror movie, but the Hollywood singing star manages to carry off her role as a woman tormented by voices and threatening phone calls. Unfortunately, they only happen when she's alone and even her husband (Rex Harrison) begins to doubt her sanity. Gripping stuff, with support from Roddy McDowall, Hermione Baddeley and Myrna Loy.

programme.title: Cattle Empire
programme.desc: A trail boss, released from prison after serving five years following a rampage by his men, accepts a job from the community's leading citizen to head up a cattle drive. However, he still harbours a grudge against his employers and seizes the chance for revenge when a rival cattle baron makes him a tempting offer. Western, starring Joel McCrea, Gloria Talbott, Don Haggerty and Phyllis Coates.

programme.title: The Night of the Grizzly
programme.desc: Marshal Jim Cole leaves his job, packs up his family and heads out to the high plains and mountains of Wyoming when he inherits his uncle's ranch. However, any hopes of a quiet life raising livestock are soon dashed by a greedy neighbour, an ex-con turned bounty hunter and the emergence from hibernation of a vicious grizzly bear known to the locals as Satan. Western, starring Clint Walker.

programme.title: Carry On Teacher
programme.desc: A headmaster hopes to land a more prestigious job at a better school, but his pupils do not want him to leave. When two inspectors pay a visit, the mischievous students see a chance to sabotage his career plans with a series of pranks. Comedy, starring Ted Ray, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey and Kenneth Williams.

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: A clumsy 25-year-old would-be reporter is given the chance to prove herself when she is sent on an assignment to get an inside take on high-school life. However, when she falls for an English teacher, she has trouble maintaining the facade of a calm and sophisticated young lady, as all the bad memories of her awkward younger days come flooding back. Romantic comedy, with Drew Barrymore, Michael Vartan and David Arquette.

programme.title: Horns
programme.desc: A man who has become an outcast after being accused of murdering his own girlfriend wakes up one morning to find he has grown horns. He discovers he now has the power to compel people to confess their sins or act on their darkest desires, and uses his supernatural gifts to expose the real killer. Horror based on Joe Hill's novel, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Juno Temple.

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: A heroin addict makes a series of attempts to kick the habit, but the grind of everyday life and a circle of similarly self-destructive friends keep dragging him back to his old ways. Following a near-fatal overdose, he comes to the realisation that the only way to put his life in order is to rid himself of his friends - which is easier said than done. Danny Boyle's drama based on Irvine Welsh's novel, starring Ewan McGregor, Robert Carlyle and Ewen Bremner.

programme.title: Mona Lisa
programme.desc: A downtrodden small-time crook gets a job as bodyguard and chauffeur to an emotionally bruised call girl, whom he gradually falls in love with. She in turn persuades him to help her save a teenage prostitute from her pimp, a goal that leads to conflict with a brutal gangster. Romantic crime thriller, starring Bob Hoskins, Cathy Tyson, Michael Caine, Robbie Coltrane and Kate Hardie.

programme.title: Four Guns to the Border
programme.desc: Four bank robbers flee for the Mexico border and seek shelter for the night with a farmer - only for one of them to cost them their sanctuary by sleeping with their host's daughter. As they continue their escape, they encounter the pair again, and cut short their flight to protect them from marauding Apaches. Western, starring Rory Calhoun and Colleen Miller.

programme.title: A Farewell to Arms
programme.desc: An American army lieutenant falls in love with a British nurse while serving in the First World War. A jealous rival strives to keep them apart as the officer is sent to the front line in Italy, but a series of twists of fate continually throw them back together. Romantic drama based on Ernest Hemingway's novel, starring Gary Cooper and Helen Hayes.

programme.title: Vertigo
programme.desc: A private eye with an aversion to heights is hired to trail the wife of an old college friend because of her strange and inconsistent behaviour. However, he soon falls obsessively in love with her, and is drawn into a complex and destructive mystery. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, starring Kim Novak in a dual role alongside James Stewart, Barbara Bel Geddes and Tom Helmore.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A girl from a wealthy family falls in love with a mysterious man over the course of the summer. However, their relationship is threatened by her parents' disapproval, and as he works to prove himself worthy of her, his own shady past is brought to light. Romantic drama based on Scott Spencer's novel, with Alex Pettyfer and Gabriella Wilde.

programme.title: Like Crazy
programme.desc: An English student falls in love with an American classmate, and tries to secretly remain in the country after her visa expires. She is forced to return home, leaving them struggling to maintain a long-distance relationship, while wrestling with immigration bureaucracy. Romantic drama, with Anton Yelchin, Felicity Jones, Jennifer Lawrence and Alex Kingston.

programme.title: Le Week-End
programme.desc: A couple decide to celebrate their 30th anniversary in Paris, where they spent their honeymoon, in the hope that returning to the site of happier times will revive the failing relationship. The holiday leads to an encounter with a prosperous old friend, who invites them to a dinner party that changes their outlook on life. Romantic comedy drama, starring Jim Broadbent, Lindsay Duncan and Jeff Goldblum.

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: The spirit of a murdered executive tries to find a way to help his girlfriend bring his killer to justice and enlists the aid of a fraudulent medium - who is amazed and baffled when her psychic powers turn out to be all too real. Romantic fantasy, starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Tony Goldwyn and an Oscar-winning Whoopi Goldberg.

programme.title: My Beautiful Laundrette
programme.desc: An ambitious Asian teenager joins forces with a former National Front member to open a trendy laundrette, but as the project develops, so does the boys' relationship - leading to mixed feelings and racial tension. Stephen Frears' comedy drama, starring Daniel Day-Lewis, Gordon Warnecke and Saeed Jaffrey. Written by Hanif Kureishi.(n)

programme.title: The Riddle of the Sands
programme.desc: An English yachtsman sailing round the coast of Germany in 1901 encounters a naval officer who has betrayed his country. Enlisting the aid of a friend, he discovers a plan by Kaiser Wilhelm to invade Britain - which they are the only ones in a position to stop. Spy thriller, starring Simon MacCorkindale, Michael York and Jenny Agutter.(n)

programme.title: None Shall Escape
programme.desc: German military officer Wilhelm Grimm is tried for crimes committed during the Second World War, and his life and career is shown in a series of flashbacks. Returning seriously injured and disenchanted from the Great War to a village on the German-Polish border, his subsequent actions caused him banishment from the community and he is attracted to the Nazi Party. Drama, starring Alexander Knox.(n)

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima
programme.desc: A tough, embittered US marine sergeant sets out to mould a group of raw recruits into men fit for action against the Japanese in the Pacific during the Second World War. Although his training methods are often brutal, his controversial approach looks set to pay dividends when they finally see real combat. Adventure, starring John Wayne, John Agar, Adele Mara and Forrest Tucker.(n)

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: Police inspector George Gideon experiences an eventful day's work. He learns one of his detectives has accepted bribes, goes on the trail of a murderous maniac and tracks a woman suspected of robbery. He also helps foil a bank heist and gets off on the wrong foot with an eager young constable. John Ford's drama, starring Jack Hawkins, Dianne Foster, Anna Lee and Anna Massey.(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: A skydiving instructor tries to clear himself of responsibility for the death of a woman whose parachute failed to open. However, he later learns she is a Russian spy who faked her own demise, and now needs his help to foil an international criminal conspiracy out to steal a fortune in bullion. Action thriller, starring Charlie Sheen, Nastassja Kinski and James Gandolfini.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: A gang of fugitives is reunited by an FBI manhunter, who offers the criminals pardons in return for their help. They must go to Europe and bring down a criminal syndicate led by a ruthless London gangster, whose right-hand woman is an old friend of theirs assumed to be dead. Action thriller sequel, with Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson and Michelle Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: Mr Nice
programme.desc: Biopic of 1970s marijuana trafficker Howard Marks, whose inventive smuggling schemes made him a huge success in the drug trade, as well as leading to dealings with both the IRA and British Intelligence. However, his efforts to crack the American market look set to bring about his downfall. Starring Rhys Ifans, Chloe Sevigny and David Thewlis.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth has disturbing dreams and begins sleepwalking. John-Boy realises there is a connection between her nightmares and a childhood experience that she cannot remember.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin's first love returns to town and intends to marry her, but her parents think she is too young and want her to finish school first.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mr Edwards arrives back at Walnut Grove harbouring some disturbing secrets, namely the destruction of his marriage to alcoholism. His friendship with Charles is also affected.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: After a plea from an old friend, Caroline Ingalls brings help to a disease-ridden gold-mining camp where she is forced to make an agonising decision about a newborn baby.

programme.title: Our Gift of Love
programme.desc: A freak accident leaves a man in a coma shortly before Christmas. While friends and family urge his wife to prepare for the worst, she refuses to accept he will not recover and dedicates herself to taking care of him. Drama, starring Rebecca De Mornay, Henry Czerny, Barclay Hope and Lila Yee.

programme.title: Face Value
programme.desc: A glamorous New York model finds being in the limelight has its drawbacks when an obsessive make-up man wages a campaign of terror against her. Fact-based drama, starring Cheryl Pollak, Dale Midkiff, Kirk Baltz and Jack Blessing.

programme.title: End of Summer
programme.desc: A Victorian artist struggles to repress her romantic feelings for a wealthy suitor, who responds by embarking on a torrid fling with her 18-year-old ward instead. Drama, starring Jacqueline Bisset, Peter Weller, Julian Sands and Amy Locane.

programme.title: Just Breathe
programme.desc: Unruly teenager Sydney's endless partying and shoplifting prompts her distraught single mother to take drastic action - she sends her daughter to live with her father and his pregnant wife. At first Sydney rebels against her new life, but when she befriends a local girl whose mum has died of cancer, she begins to appreciate how lucky she is to have a loving family. Drama, with Brittney Wilson, Melora Hardin and Paul McGillion.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A widow enlists John-Boy's help in her efforts to win the affections of a farm worker who is hoping to settle down.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A talented player leaves the townsfolk convinced they will win an annual baseball game, but when they start betting on the event, his disapproving wife forbids him from taking part.

programme.title: The Engagement Ring
programme.desc: When a missing engagement ring turns up 40 years after it was lost, its appearance opens old wounds but also prompts a new romance to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Patricia Heaton, Vincent Spano, Tony Lo Bianco and David Hunt.

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman who has lived her life under constant pressure from her mother to find a man gets engaged, only for her fiance to leave her just before she is due to head home for Thanksgiving. Rather than face parental disapproval, she hires an actor to pose as her future husband. Comedy, with Bonnie Somerville, Shelley Long and Haylie Duff.

programme.title: Kidnapped: The Elizabeth Smart Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the abduction of a teenager from her home in Salt Lake City in 2002. The search for the girl turned into a nationwide media frenzy, but nine months later as hope was fading, she was found alive and well in the company of an unbalanced couple. Starring Amber Marshall, Dylan Baker and Lindsay Frost.

programme.title: Dangerous Intuition
programme.desc: A woman is convinced that her ex-husband's new girlfriend is trying to harm their daughter when she goes to stay with her dad under the shared custody agreement. Thriller, starring Genea Charpentier, David Cubitt and Tricia Helfer.

programme.title: The Cry
programme.desc: Part two of two. Meg's abduction of Eleanor hits the headlines, forcing her to go on the run under an assumed name. She breaks into Christine's family home and poses as a journalist in the hope of uncovering evidence of child abuse. Psychological thriller, starring Sarah Lancashire, Emma Cunniffe and Anthony Calf.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John gets an office job while business is slow at the mill, but finds adjusting to a new daily routine difficult.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin graduates from school, but is worried that she does not know what she wants to do with her life.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: He Was Only Twelve - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of three. James walks into a bank in the middle of a robbery and gets caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: He Was Only Twelve - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of three. Charles undergoes a deep religious experience as his son's life hangs in the balance after being shot.

programme.title: The Lion in Winter
programme.desc: Part one of two. In the winter of 1183, King Henry II struggles to choose an heir to the throne, a decision that creates conflict with his wife and three sons. Historical drama, starring Patrick Stewart and Glenn Close.

programme.title: Going Home
programme.desc: A woman sacrifices her promising career to care for her elderly father, but soon realises she made the right choice. Drama, starring Jason Robards and Sherry Stringfield.

programme.title: Tears in the Rain
programme.desc: An American woman tries to fulfil her mother's dying wish by delivering a letter to an English lord, who denies ever having known her. When she falls in love with his son, the suspicious aristocrat delves into the American's past - only to realise she may be his daughter. Romantic drama, starring Sharon Stone and Christopher Cazenove.

programme.title: Charlie & Me
programme.desc: An old man has a very close relationship with his 12-year-old granddaughter. When he falls ill, he realises he may not live much longer, and decides to teach her everything he knows while he still can. However, he finds she has just as much to teach him about living his life to the full. Family drama, with Tom Bosley and Jordy Benattar.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy catches his friend Yancy Tucker stealing two chickens and agonises over whether to report him. With Richard Thomas and Robert Donner.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Although many in Walnut Grove think he's a crazy man in a haunted house, brave Laura befriends mysterious hermit Amos Pike and soon discovers the truth behind the rumours.

programme.title: The Lost Valentine
programme.desc: A reporter investigates the story of an old woman whose husband disappeared without trace while serving in the Air Force during the Second World War, and who makes an annual pilgrimage to the last place she saw him. Touched by the devotion, the reporter tries to find the lost airman's final resting place. Drama, with Jennifer Love Hewitt and Betty White.

programme.title: The War Bride
programme.desc: A cockney seamstress marries a Canadian serviceman after a whirlwind romance in London during the Second World War. She is sent to live with his family on their farm in a backwater of Alberta until the conflict is over, but she struggles to get along with her dour in-laws, who make no attempt to welcome her. Drama, starring Anna Friel, Brenda Fricker, Molly Parker, Loren Dean and Aden Young.

programme.title: The Amy Fisher Story
programme.desc: A teenager assaults her alleged older lover's wife, and becomes a media sensation at the subsequent trial. Fact-based drama exploring the intimate details of the case, starring Drew Barrymore, Anthony John Denison and Harley Jane Kozak.

programme.title: Run for Your Life
programme.desc: A woman and her two daughters are stalked by her abusive ex-husband, and she finds the law is unable to protect her from him. She begins to feel that her children's safety can only be guaranteed by the family going into hiding or resorting to murder. Fact-based thriller, starring Amy Smart and Mark Humphrey.

programme.title: The Last Don
programme.desc: Three-part crime drama focusing on America's most powerful Mafia family, based on the novel by Godfather author Mario Puzo. Danny Aiello stars as patriarch Domenico Clericuzo, whose world falls apart when his son is murdered by rivals - the same gang whose leading protagonist is about to marry his daughter. Kirstie Alley, Daryl Hannah and Joe Mantegna also star, with an appearance by singer kd lang.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy learns the sheriff is a war hero, but wants to forget the terrible things he witnessed during the conflict.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is sent to report on the landing of the Hindenburg, but is traumatised when he witnesses its destruction and the deaths of many passengers.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls, Oleson and Garvey families get tired of the bustling city life and decide to return to Walnut Grove, where a shock awaits them.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jenny blames herself when her father dies following a family outing, and despite Laura and Almanzo's attempts to comfort her, slips into a deep depression.(n)

programme.title: The Lion in Winter
programme.desc: Part two of two. In the winter of 1183, King Henry II struggles to choose an heir to the throne, a decision that creates conflict with his wife and three sons. Historical drama, starring Patrick Stewart and Glenn Close.(n)

programme.title: Son of the Morning Star
programme.desc: Part one of two. Historical epic following US army officer George Custer's role in the Indian Plains Wars, and the rise of his eventual nemesis, the Native American war leader Crazy Horse, who was inspired by a vision to lead his people to freedom. As conflicts erupt and treaties are broken, the two men are drawn into a final confrontation at the Little Big Horn. Starring Gary Cole, Rodney A Grant and Rosanna Arquette.(n)

programme.title: A Dad for Christmas
programme.desc: A 19-year-old father visits his newborn son in hospital for the first time, only to find the boy's mother has already put him up for adoption. In desperation, he kidnaps the baby and hides out at his grandmother's house. Drama, starring Kristopher Turner, Louise Fletcher, Lindsay Ames and Dino Bellisario.(n)

programme.title: Daniel's Daughter
programme.desc: A magazine editor receives news of her estranged father's death, and agrees to fulfil his final wish to scatter his ashes at the family's old home, an undertaking forces her to confront the past she left behind. Drama, starring Laura Leighton, London Angelis, Martin Doyle, Brandon Firla and Dorly Jean-Louis.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A forthcoming county fair brings out a streak of competitiveness in the family. Olivia is surprised to hear her childhood sweetheart, the now wealthy Oscar Cockrell, is to be one of the judges. Peter Donat guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and Grace are frustrated that the boys they want to take them to the spring dance are showing no interest, so decide to make them jealous.(n)

programme.title: Come Dance at My Wedding
programme.desc: A woman about to get married plans to sell off her dead mother's dance studio, only to find it is partly the property of her father, whom she has never met. She and her estranged parent quickly form a connection, but she finds he is reluctant to see his ex-wife's cherished business close down, while her fiance feels threatened by his new in-law. Drama, starring John Schneider and Brooke Nevin.(n)

programme.title: Straight from the Heart
programme.desc: A jilted New York woman despairs of ever finding the man of her dreams, until a personal ad leads to contact with a lonesome cowboy. Leaving the city behind her, she heads west to start a new life at his side - but their relationship struggles because of their differences. Romantic drama, starring Teri Polo, Andrew McCarthy, Greg Evigan and Christine Tucci.(n)

programme.title: Let Him Have It
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the controversial 1952 murder trial in which 19-year-old Derek Bentley was sentenced to be hanged for killing a policeman - even though his friend Chris Craig was the one who fired the fatal gunshot. Starring Christopher Eccleston, Paul Reynolds, Tom Courtenay, Eileen Atkins, Tom Bell and Mark McGann.(n)

programme.title: The Pastor's Wife
programme.desc: True story based on Mary Winkler, who stunned a nation by murdering her preacher husband. But was everything in their life as serene as it appeared? Starring Rose McGowan.(n)

programme.title: The Last Don
programme.desc: Part two. Ten years after the murder of his favourite son, Don Clericuzio faces further family turmoil as Cross draws closer to the heart of the family while cousin Dante's increasingly psychopathic behaviour proves a major liability. Underworld drama based on the novel by Godfather author Mario Puzo, starring Danny Aiello, Jason Gedrick and Rory Cochrane.(n)

programme.title: PopFan
programme.desc: A pop star hoping to reinvent her public image crashes her car during a storm, and is rescued by a mysterious stranger, who takes her to his home in a secluded lighthouse to recuperate. She discovers she has fallen into the clutches of an unstable obsessive fan, who cannot tell the difference between her music videos and reality. Thriller, starring Chelsea Kane and Nolan Gerard Funk.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth has disturbing dreams and begins sleepwalking. John-Boy realises there is a connection between her nightmares and a childhood experience that she cannot remember.

programme.desc: A forthcoming county fair brings out a streak of competitiveness in the family. Olivia is surprised to hear her childhood sweetheart, the now wealthy Oscar Cockrell, is to be one of the judges. Peter Donat guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and Grace are frustrated that the boys they want to take them to the spring dance are showing no interest, so decide to make them jealous.(n)

programme.title: Come Dance at My Wedding
programme.desc: A woman about to get married plans to sell off her dead mother's dance studio, only to find it is partly the property of her father, whom she has never met. She and her estranged parent quickly form a connection, but she finds he is reluctant to see his ex-wife's cherished business close down, while her fiance feels threatened by his new in-law. Drama, starring John Schneider and Brooke Nevin.(n)

programme.title: Straight from the Heart
programme.desc: A jilted New York woman despairs of ever finding the man of her dreams, until a personal ad leads to contact with a lonesome cowboy. Leaving the city behind her, she heads west to start a new life at his side - but their relationship struggles because of their differences. Romantic drama, starring Teri Polo, Andrew McCarthy, Greg Evigan and Christine Tucci.(n)

programme.title: Let Him Have It
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the controversial 1952 murder trial in which 19-year-old Derek Bentley was sentenced to be hanged for killing a policeman - even though his friend Chris Craig was the one who fired the fatal gunshot. Starring Christopher Eccleston, Paul Reynolds, Tom Courtenay, Eileen Atkins, Tom Bell and Mark McGann.(n)

programme.title: The Pastor's Wife
programme.desc: True story based on Mary Winkler, who stunned a nation by murdering her preacher husband. But was everything in their life as serene as it appeared? Starring Rose McGowan.(n)

programme.title: The Covenant
programme.desc: Saul goes to Abu Dhabi. Carrie delivers bad news. Quinn senses something
